jcr:content.data: { "id":"B075X4VWF9", "name":"Leila Tufted Living Room Sofa Couch, 88\\"W, Smoky Teal", "mainImage":"https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/91/91UMjSs5XgL.jpg", "images":[ "https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/91/91LlW4o+tXL.jpg", "https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/A1/A11i7JV5oxL.jpg", "https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/B1/B17PiPFEdfS.jpg", "https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/A1/A11i7JV5oxL.jpg", "https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/B1/B17PiPFEdfS.jpg", "https://storage.googleapis.com/puresight-pim-images/original/A1/A1I1JSeKUkL.jpg" ], "height":"31.0", "width":"88.0", "length":"36.0", "dimensionUnit":"inches", "weight":"165.0", "weightUnit":"pounds", "bulletPoints":[ "This item is made to order just for you", "88\\"W x 36\\"D x 31\\"H", "Solid wood frame and legs with durable fabric upholstery.", "The tight, fixed back and removable/reversible cushions ensure durability and comfort.", "Treat yourself to luxury in this striking, vintage look sofa. With solid wood legs in a dark walnut finish, plush upholstery and a low, curved tufted back, it exudes opulence. Three removable/reversible seat cushions ensure many years of use.", "Assemble in 15 minutes or less. Vacuum or wipe with a soft, dry cloth.", "Free returns for 30 days. 3-year warranty." ], "keywords":[ "Stone & beam", "Chair", "Blue", "88\\" sofa", "Couch", "Accent chair", "Sectional couch", "Sofa", "Sofa bed", "Sleeper sofa", "Futon", "Farmhouse", "Sofa sets for living room", "Living room furniture", "Sofas", "Loveseat", "Smoky teal", "Sectional sofa", "Stone and beam", "Recliner chair" ], "category":"Accent Furniture", "type":"Home furniture and decor", "reviews": [ { "title": "A Dreamy Slumber", "content": "This bed has been a game-changer for my sleep quality. The comfort level is unmatched, and it feels like I'm sleeping on a cloud. I wake up refreshed and ready to tackle the day. Worth every penny!", "stars": 5, "author": "Sarah Johnson", "date": "July 15, 2023" }, { "title": "Cozy and Supportive", "content": "The bed provides a cozy nest-like feeling, and the support is excellent for my back. While it's a bit pricier than I'd like, the comfort it offers makes it a solid investment for a good night's sleep.", "stars": 4, "author": "Michael Thompson", "date": "August 3, 2023" }, { "title": "Mixed Feelings", "content": "This bed is alright, but it hasn't quite lived up to my expectations. The initial comfort is decent, but after a while, I've noticed some sagging in certain areas. It's an okay choice for the price point.", "stars": 5, "author": "Emily Roberts", "date": "June 21, 2023" }, { "title": "Sleek Design, Restful Sleep", "content": "The minimalist design of this bed caught my eye, and it complements my bedroom decor perfectly. As for comfort, it's mostly satisfying, though I wish the mattress were slightly softer. Overall, a solid purchase.", "stars": 4, "author": "David Anderson", "date": "September 8, 2023" }, { "title": "Above Average Bed", "content": "I've had this bed for a few months now, and it's definitely better than my previous one. The quality is noticeable, and I find myself tossing and turning less during the night. While it's not flawless, it's a step up in terms of sleep comfort.", "stars": 3, "author": "Jessica Lee", "date": "May 2, 2023" } ], "vendors": [ { "image": "/content/puresight/assets/Products/vendors/image 8.png", "deliveryTime": "Delivery by the day", "price": "22€" }, { "image": "/content/puresight/assets/Products/vendors/image 8-1.png", "deliveryTime": "Delivery by the day", "price": "22€" }, { "image": "/content/puresight/assets/Products/vendors/image 8-2.png", "deliveryTime": "Delivery by the day", "price": "22€" }, { "image": "/content/puresight/assets/Products/vendors/image 8-3.png", "deliveryTime": "Delivery by the day", "price": "22€" } ] }

content_1.text: Everything in your student room should bring you comfort. Choose a desk and bed that you’re happy to spend lots of time with, and display your trinkets proudly!

content1.text: Ready to transform your living space? Sign up for Puresight’s newsletter now for exclusive deals and fresh design inspirations.
